( Shadowwarrior_ax: This is a new character that I'm adding into the NBWRPG. 
Her name can just be added beside my address or her stats can be put up in 
the site, either is fine with me.)

Name: Rage
Beast Mode: Overgrown Utahraptor
Gender: Female
Allegiance: Neutral

On a planet where dinosaurs still roamed the land, an ancient race of 
robotic warriors dwelled.
Savage and cunning, these warriors were the top predators on this 
prehistoric world.
However, as every warrior was different in their own way they still all had 
one thing in common...their Beast Modes dominated over their logical Robot 
Modes.
Rage was one of them!
Being taken from her planet by raiding Predacons, Rage was used and abused 
as a captured slave.
However, on one occasion the Predacon ship malfunctioned and crashed on 
prehistoric Earth, with the ship down and every member of the crew dead Rage 
was forced into the harsh conditions of a strange world at a young age.
Being forced into this strange environment Rage soon adapted her skills and 
sharpened her instincts, the wild was her home.
As she grew into adulthood the instincts and hormones of her Beast Mode 
dominated her systems and soon took over to the extent that she had even 
forgotten how to speak.
Now she roams the lands of prehistoric Earth, unaware of the Beast Wars and 
living that of the life of her Beast Mode, barely conscious that she had 
ever even been able to transform but being able to think clearly.
Standing 6:11 and all bulk and muscle, Rage hunts the lands of prehistoric 
Earth.
WARNING: If ever incountering this being it is advised to transform into 
Robot Mode or be mistaken for prey!
